comments:
When deleting a dynamic web project I get this stacktrace in the Eclipse log file:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.resources 4 273 2006-03-04 10:55:18.636
!MESSAGE Problems encountered while deleting resources.
!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 273 2006-03-04 10:55:18.636
!MESSAGE Could not delete: /hska.
!STACK 1
org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ResourceException: Problems encountered while deleting resources.
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.localstore.FileSystemResourceManager.delete(FileSystemResourceManager.java:193)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ResourceTree.standardDeleteProject(ResourceTree.java:828)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Resource.unprotectedDelete(Resource.java:1636)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Resource.delete(Resource.java:695)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Project.delete(Project.java:345)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.DeleteResourceAction.delete(DeleteResourceAction.java:428)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.DeleteResourceAction.delete(DeleteResourceAction.java:404)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.DeleteResourceAction.access$0(DeleteResourceAction.java:394)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.DeleteResourceAction$3.run(DeleteResourceAction.java:511)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1733)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.DeleteResourceAction$2.run(DeleteResourceAction.java:509)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
!SUBENTRY 2 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 273 2006-03-04 10:55:18.636
!MESSAGE Problems encountered while deleting resources.
!SUBENTRY 3 org.eclipse.core.filesystem 4 273 2006-03-04 10:55:18.636
!MESSAGE Problems encountered while deleting files.
!SUBENTRY 4 org.eclipse.core.filesystem 4 273 2006-03-04 10:55:18.636
!MESSAGE Could not delete: C:\Daten\eclipse-workspace\hska\WebContent\WEB-INF\lib\antlr-2.7.6rc1.jar.

and so on for each JAR file contained in WEB-INF\lib.

Tomcat 5.5 is configured as the default runtime.

Juergen, can you provide any information about what sort of things you were doing *before* you tried to delete the project (opening views, editors, building, publishing, etc.)?  I fear this will be nearly impossible to track down otherwise.

(In reply to comment #1)

I've identified the problem: In an editor (Notepad+) I had a file of the web project. An this beast was holding a directory lock. Thus WTP had no chance to delete the whole project. I wouldn't consider this situation as a bug.
This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP bugs which are in the resolved state without an appropriate targeted version.  If you feel this bug was closed inappropriately, please reopen.
